meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or used in invocation.
meanings.sent1: The invocatory chant set a peaceful mood for the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The priestess performed the invocatory ritual to call upon the spirits.
meanings.sent3: The invocatory prayer made everyone smile with its heartfelt words.
meanings.sent4: Her invocatory gestures seemed to awaken ancient powers within the room.
meanings.sent5: The invocatory symbols on the altar glowed with a mysterious light.

meanings.sent3: His invocatory gesture of raising his hands made the audience burst into applause.
meanings.sent4: The invocatory melody seemed to beckon the stars to shine brighter in the night sky.
